text_block_list.text: Oh… You're in yet another special magazine feature, nee-sama!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (Mejiro Ramonu, the first in history to win the Triple Tiara… the pride of the Mejiro family… Fairest Obisdian… the unbreakable Triple Tiara Umamusume.)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (But for all the extravagant epithets they bestow her… there's hardly anything written about the radiance she commands.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Neither longing nor jealousy could ever hope to draw even with my sister. Truly… she is magnificent.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (Perhaps she's testing me by having me go in her stead this time. Testing to see if I'm capable of standing amongst these leviathans.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: The question is whether my radiance could ever match hers or not.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (Naturally, I shall not falter. I shall not crumble! Come what may, I will not give in until the performance is complete!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
I'll show everyone a radiance that 
will bring pride to my sister's name!
Looks like you all have gotten used to the big brushes! I think it's time we work on nailing down the performance.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: We're going to do the real thing in a gym, but for now let's use all the space we have on this field!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: For the structure of the performance, we'll divide it into two parts. First, C.B. and Ace will write the first half.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Then, Maruzensky, Ardan, and myself will do the last half, and we'll conclude after we hang them up.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: 'Aight, roger that! That means we're up first, C.B… Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Here goes… hiyah!

Haha, looking good, Ace! Your movements 
look totally different from yesterday.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: 'Course they do! No matter how high a wall ya put in front of me, I'll just knock it down and go straight to the top!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's not just her movements, but her writing looks bolder, too! That girl's got guts for sure!
'Kay, time for the next character! You ready, C.B.?!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Hehe… hahaha! I've been ready! I'm having fun, so much fun… ah, I just can't hold it in anymore!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, C.B.—
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: C'mon Ace, follow my lead!
A… a backflip?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Gosh, talk about unexpected! But look, 
her handwriting's still so beautiful!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
She's moving so boldly, even though one mistake 
could cost her… how is she so composed?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Hey, I see you all over there! Are you just gonna watch? Don'tcha think that's boring?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Your turn's up next. C'mon!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text:
… Goodness, she's as zealous as ever. 
That capricious nature of hers hasn't changed a bit.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wow, talk about wiggin' out! But that's why we're here, isn't it? Let's give it a shot too, eh?

Hu-! 
Huup!
text_block_list.name: Maruzen & Rudolf

text_block_list.text: O-oh… gh…!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (I-I musn't join in… right now, the air between them is just… so…!)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Guys, guys… guys, guys, guys, guys, guys!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I swear, it's like herding cats…!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I really… froze up there, didn't I?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Truthfully, I came to practice today thinking 
I would be able to keep up with you all, but…

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Geez, they're seriously somethin' else! All those crazy moves and their writing was still perfect. They've got complete control over their bodies and the brush.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
But hey, that's just how they are. 
The ceiling doesn't exist for 'em.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
They're the real strong ones. 
Always gettin' stronger with no end in sight.
No end in sight, you say…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: But that ain't all. Tomorrow's a new day for us, Ardan!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: No matter where they go, we'll give 'em chase!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: You're right. That we shall, Ace-san!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
